content_html: Arab and Islamic states expressed full solidarity with Qatar in the face of the Israeli attack on Doha on Sep. 9, which targeted residential compounds housing the Hamas negotiating delegation and resulted in deaths and injuries. During the UN Security Council session on Thursday evening to discuss the assault, Egypt&

title: UN Security Council Emergency Meeting: Arab, Islamic Solidarity with Qatar Following Brutal Israeli Attack
